Package nz.org.venice.chart

Provides a graphing module that allows for charting a wide variety of indicators.

See:
          Description

Class Summary
BasicChartUI Chart Implementation.
Chart New swing component that allows creation of charts.
ChartDrawingModel  
ChartModule The charting module for venice.
ChartOutOfBoundsException An exception which is raised when the chart is zoomed in where there is no graph data.
Coordinate  
DrawnLine  
EODQuoteChartMenu Provides a menu which is associated with a stock symbol being graphed.
Graphable Represents a graphable set of X points and their associated Y points.
GraphableQuoteFunctionSource Allow the QuoteFunctions package to use quotes directly from a Graphable.
GraphSettingsDialog Provides a dialog that enables the user to modify graph settings.
GraphTools  
HorizontalAxis  
MarketIndicatorChartMenu Provides a menu which is associated with a market indicator being graphed.
PFData A wrapper for Point and Figure data
PFGraphable Represents a graphable set of X points and their associated list of Y points.
PortfolioChartMenu Provides a menu which is associated with a stock symbol being graphed.
UserNotes Provides a text area for which a user can make notes regarding thie stock symbol being graphed.
VerticalAxis  
 

Package nz.org.venice.chart Description

Provides a graphing module that allows for charting a wide variety of indicators.
